patterns.name: entity.name.class
patterns.match: \b(create balance inquiry response|create account lookup response|register response parameter|create compliance response|switch to default content|register table parameter|close all child windows|create posting response|create advice response|wait for windows count|create fraud response|select from combo box|create pacs payment|invoke oracle query|download resources|get message status|register parameter|send cdb response|submit mq message|navigate forward|switch to window|wait for element|move to element|switch to alert|switch to frame|copy parameter|delete request|execute script|get screenshot|close browser|context click|finastra ping|google search|hide keyboard|navigate back|patch request|sample action|try send keys|wait for page|close window|double click|geo location|kill process|post request|wait for url|get request|submit form|upload file|long swipe|go to url|no action|send keys|try click|keyboard|refresh|scroll|click|swipe|wait)\b

patterns.name: entity.name.function
patterns.match: ((?<=\{)android ui automator(?=})|(?<=\{)android data matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)android view matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)windows automation(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ui automation(?=})|(?<=\{)partial link text(?=})|(?<=\{)accessibility id(?=})|(?<=\{)tizen automation(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ns predicate(?=})|(?<=\{)ios class chain(?=})|(?<=\{)response body(?=})|(?<=\{)css selector(?=})|(?<=\{)status code(?=})|(?<=\{)text length(?=})|(?<=\{)class name(?=})|(?<=\{)attribute(?=})|(?<=\{)link text(?=})|(?<=\{)selected(?=})|(?<=\{)tag name(?=})|(?<=\{)enabled(?=})|(?<=\{)visible(?=})|(?<=\{)binding(?=})|(?<=\{)driver(?=})|(?<=\{)exists(?=})|(?<=\{)x path(?=})|(?<=\{)count(?=})|(?<=\{)stale(?=})|(?<=\{)title(?=})|(?<=\{)image(?=})|(?<=\{)model(?=})|(?<=\{)date(?=})|(?<=\{)text(?=})|(?<=\{)name(?=})|(?<=\{)from(?=})|(?<=\{)url(?=})|(?<=\{)xml(?=})|(?<=\{)id(?=}))
